   21: 
   22: %% 
   23: %% ts:run(inets, httpc_proxy_SUITE, [batch]).
   24: %% ct:run("../inets_test", httpc_proxy_SUITE).
   25: %%
   26: 
   27: -module(httpc_proxy_SUITE).
   28: 
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: 
   31: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   32: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   33: 
   34: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   35: -compile(export_all).
   36: 
   37: -define(LOCAL_PROXY_SCRIPT, "server_proxy.sh").
   38: -define(p(F, A), % Debug printout
   39: 	begin
   40: 	    io:format(
   41: 	      "~w ~w: " ++ begin F end,
   42: 	      [self(),?MODULE] ++ begin A end)
   43: 	end).
   44: 
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: 
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   51: 
   52: all() ->
   53:     [{group,local_proxy},
   54:      {group,local_proxy_https}].
   55: 
   56: groups() -> 
   57:     [{local_proxy,[],
   58:       [http_emulate_lower_versions
   59:        |local_proxy_cases()]},
   60:      {local_proxy_https,[],
   61:       local_proxy_cases() ++ local_proxy_https_cases()}].
   62: 
   63: %% internal functions
   64: 
   65: local_proxy_cases() ->
   66:     [http_head,
   67:      http_get,
   68:      http_options,
   69:      http_trace,
   70:      http_post,
   71:      http_put,
   72:      http_delete,
   73:      http_delete_body,
   74:      http_headers,
   75:      http_proxy_auth,
   76:      http_doesnotexist,
   77:      http_stream,
   78:      http_not_modified_otp_6821].
   79: 
   80: local_proxy_https_cases() ->
   81:     [https_connect_error,
   82:      http_timeout].
   83: 
   84: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   85: 
   86: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   87:     case init_apps(suite_apps(), Config0) of
   88: 	Config when is_list(Config) ->
   89: 	    make_cert_files(Config),
   90: 	    Config;
   91: 	Other ->
   92: 	    Other
   93:     end.
   94: 
   95: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   96:     [app_stop(App) || App <- r(suite_apps())],
   97:     ok.
   98: 
   99: %% internal functions
  100: 
  101: suite_apps() ->
  102:     [asn1,crypto,public_key].
  103:     
  104: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  105: 
  106: init_per_group(local_proxy, Config) ->
  107:     init_local_proxy([{protocol,http}|Config]);
  108: init_per_group(local_proxy_https, Config) ->
  109:     init_local_proxy([{protocol,https}|Config]).
  110: 
  111: end_per_group(Group, Config)
  112:   when
  113:       Group =:= local_proxy;
  114:       Group =:= local_proxy_https ->
  115:     rcmd_local_proxy(["stop"], Config),
  116:     Config;
  117: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  118:     Config.
  119: 
  120: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  121: 
  122: init_per_testcase(Case, Config0) ->
  123:     ct:timetrap({seconds,30}),
  124:     Apps = apps(Case, Config0),
  125:     case init_apps(Apps, Config0) of
  126: 	Config when is_list(Config) ->
  127: 	    case app_start(inets, Config) of
  128: 		ok ->
  129: 		    Config;
  130: 		Error ->
  131: 		    [app_stop(N) || N <- [inets|r(Apps)]],
  132: 		    ct:fail({could_not_init_inets,Error})
  133: 	    end;
  134: 	E3 ->
  135: 	    E3
  136:     end.
  137: 
  138: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  139:     app_stop(inets),
  140:     Config.
  141: 
  142: %% internal functions
  143: 
  144: apps(_Case, Config) ->
  145:     case proplists:get_value(protocol, Config) of
  146: 	https ->
  147: 	    [ssl];
  148: 	_ ->
  149: 	    []
  150:     end.
  151: 
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  155: 
  156: http_head(doc) ->
  157:     ["Test http/https HEAD request."];
  158: http_head(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  159:     Method = head,
  160:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  161:     Request = {URL,[]},
  162:     HttpOpts = [],
  163:     Opts = [],
  164:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[]}} =
  165: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  166:     ok.
  167: 
  168: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  169: 
  170: http_get(doc) ->
  171:     ["Test http/https GET request."];
  172: http_get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  173:     Method = get,
  174:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  175:     Request = {URL,[]},
  176:     Timeout = timer:seconds(1),
  177:     ConnTimeout = Timeout + timer:seconds(1),
  178: 
  179:     HttpOpts1 = [{timeout,Timeout},{connect_timeout,ConnTimeout}],
  180:     Opts1 = [],
  181:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]=B1}} =
  182: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts1, Opts1),
  183:     inets_test_lib:check_body(B1),
  184: 
  185:     HttpOpts2 = [],
  186:     Opts2 = [{body_format,binary}],
  187:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],B2}} =
  188: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts2, Opts2),
  189:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(B2)).
  190: 
  191: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  192: 
  193: http_options(doc) ->
  194:     ["Perform an OPTIONS request."];
  195: http_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  196:     Method = options,
  197:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  198:     Request = {URL,[]},
  199:     HttpOpts = [],
  200:     Opts = [],
  201:     {ok,{{_,200,_},Headers,_}} =
  202: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  203:     {value,_} = lists:keysearch("allow", 1, Headers),
  204:     ok.
  205: 
  206: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  207: 
  208: http_trace(doc) ->
  209:     ["Perform a TRACE request."];
  210: http_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  211:     Method = trace,
  212:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  213:     Request = {URL,[]},
  214:     HttpOpts = [],
  215:     Opts = [],
  216:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],"TRACE "++_}} =
  217: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  218:     ok.
  219: 
  220: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  221: 
  222: http_post(doc) ->
  223:     ["Perform a POST request that goes through a proxy. When the "
  224:      "request goes to an ordinary file it seems the POST data "
  225:      "is ignored."];
  226: http_post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  227:     Method = post,
  228:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  229:     Request = {URL,[],"text/plain","foobar"},
  230:     HttpOpts = [],
  231:     Opts = [],
  232:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  233: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  234:     ok.
  235: 
  236: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  237: 
  238: http_put(doc) ->
  239:     ["Perform a PUT request. The server will not allow it "
  240:      "but we only test sending the request."];
  241: http_put(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  242:     Method = put,
  243:     URL = url("/put.html", Config),
  244:     Content =
  245: 	"<html><body> <h1>foo</h1> <p>bar</p> </body></html>",
  246:     Request = {URL,[],"html",Content},
  247:     HttpOpts = [],
  248:     Opts = [],
  249:     {ok,{{_,405,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  250: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  251:     ok.
  252: 
  253: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  254: 
  255: http_delete(doc) ->
  256:     ["Perform a DELETE request that goes through a proxy. Note the server "
  257:      "will reject the request with a 405 Method Not Allowed,"
  258:      "but this is just a test of sending the request."];
  259: http_delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     Method = delete,
  261:     URL = url("/delete.html", Config),
  262:     Request = {URL,[]},
  263:     HttpOpts = [],
  264:     Opts = [],
  265:     {ok,{{_,405,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  266: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  267:     ok.
  268: 
  269: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  270: 
  271: http_delete_body(doc) ->
  272:     ["Perform a DELETE request with a content body. The server will not allow it "
  273:      "but we only test sending the request."];
  274: http_delete_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  275:     Method = delete,
  276:     URL = url("/delete.html", Config),
  277:     Content = "foo=bar",
  278:     Request = {URL,[],"application/x-www-form-urlencoded",Content},
  279:     HttpOpts = [],
  280:     Opts = [],
  281:     {ok,{{_,405,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  282:     httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  283:     ok.
  284: 
  285: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  286: 
  287: http_headers(doc) ->
  288:     ["Use as many request headers as possible"];
  289: http_headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  290:     Method = get,
  291:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  292:     Headers =
  293: 	[{"Accept",
  294: 	  "text/*, text/html, text/html;level=1, */*"},
  295: 	 {"Accept-Charset",
  296: 	  "iso-8859-5, unicode-1-1;q=0.8"},
  297: 	 {"Accept-Encoding", "*"},
  298: 	 {"Accept-Language",
  299: 	  "sv, en-gb;q=0.8, en;q=0.7"},
  300: 	 {"User-Agent", "inets"},
  301: 	 {"Max-Forwards","5"},
  302: 	 {"Referer",
  303: 	  "http://otp.ericsson.se:8000/product/internal"}],
  304:     Request = {URL,Headers},
  305:     HttpOpts = [],
  306:     Opts = [],
  307:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  308: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  309:     ok.
  310: 
  311: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  312: 
  313: http_proxy_auth(doc) ->
  314:     ["Test the code for sending of proxy authorization."];
  315: http_proxy_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  316:     %% Our proxy seems to ignore the header, however our proxy
  317:     %% does not requirer an auth header, but we want to know
  318:     %% at least the code for sending the header does not crash!
  319:     Method = get,
  320:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  321:     Request = {URL,[]},
  322:     HttpOpts = [{proxy_auth,{"foo","bar"}}],
  323:     Opts = [],
  324:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  325: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  326:     ok.
  327: 
  328: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  329: 
  330: http_doesnotexist(doc) ->
  331:     ["Test that we get a 404 when the page is not found."];
  332: http_doesnotexist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  333:     Method = get,
  334:     URL = url("/doesnotexist.html", Config),
  335:     Request = {URL,[]},
  336:     HttpOpts = [{proxy_auth,{"foo","bar"}}],
  337:     Opts = [],
  338:     {ok,{{_,404,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  339: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  340:     ok.
  341: 
  342: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  343: 
  344: http_stream(doc) ->
  345:     ["Test the option stream for asynchronous requests"];
  346: http_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  347:     Method = get,
  348:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  349:     Request = {URL,[]},
  350:     HttpOpts = [],
  351: 
  352:     Opts1 = [{body_format,binary}],
  353:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],Body}} =
  354: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts1),
  355: 
  356:     Opts2 = [{sync,false},{stream,self}],
  357:     {ok,RequestId} =
  358: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts2),
  359:     receive
  360: 	{http,{RequestId,stream_start,[_|_]}} ->
  361: 	    ok
  362:     end,
  363:     case http_stream(RequestId, <<>>) of
  364: 	Body -> ok
  365:     end.
  366:     %% StreamedBody = http_stream(RequestId, <<>>),
  367:     %% Body =:= StreamedBody,
  368:     %% ok.
  369: 
  370: http_stream(RequestId, Body) ->
  371:     receive
  372: 	{http,{RequestId,stream,Bin}} ->
  373: 	    http_stream(RequestId, <<Body/binary,Bin/binary>>);
  374: 	{http,{RequestId,stream_end,_Headers}} ->
  375: 	    Body
  376:     end.
  377: 
  378: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  379: 
  380: http_emulate_lower_versions(doc) ->
  381:     ["Perform requests as 1.0 and 1.1 clients."];
  382: http_emulate_lower_versions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  383:     Method = get,
  384:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  385:     Request = {URL,[]},
  386:     Opts = [],
  387: 
  388:     HttpOpts1 = [{version,"HTTP/1.0"}],
  389:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]=B2}} =
  390: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts1, Opts),
  391:     inets_test_lib:check_body(B2),
  392: 
  393:     HttpOpts2 = [{version,"HTTP/1.1"}],
  394:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]=B3}} =
  395: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts2, Opts),
  396:     inets_test_lib:check_body(B3),
  397: 
  398:     ok.
  399: 
  400: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  401: http_not_modified_otp_6821(doc) ->
  402:     ["If unmodified no body should be returned"];
  403: http_not_modified_otp_6821(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  404:     Method = get,
  405:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  406:     Opts = [],
  407: 
  408:     Request1 = {URL,[]},
  409:     HttpOpts1 = [],
  410:     {ok,{{_,200,_},ReplyHeaders,[_|_]}} =
  411: 	 httpc:request(Method, Request1, HttpOpts1, Opts),
  412:      ETag = header_value("etag", ReplyHeaders),
  413:      LastModified = header_value("last-modified", ReplyHeaders),
  414: 
  415:      Request2 =
  416: 	 {URL,
  417: 	  [{"If-None-Match",ETag},
  418: 	   {"If-Modified-Since",LastModified}]},
  419:      HttpOpts2 = [{timeout,15000}], % Limit wait for bug result
  420:      {ok,{{_,304,_},_,[]}} = % Page Unchanged
  421: 	 httpc:request(Method, Request2, HttpOpts2, Opts),
  422: 
  423:      ok.
  424: 
  425: header_value(Name, [{HeaderName,HeaderValue}|Headers]) ->
  426:     case string:to_lower(HeaderName) of
  427: 	Name ->
  428: 	    HeaderValue;
  429: 	_ ->
  430: 	    header_value(Name, Headers)
  431:     end.
  432: 
  433: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  434: https_connect_error(doc) ->
  435:     ["Error from CONNECT tunnel should be returned"];
  436: https_connect_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  437:     {HttpServer,HttpPort} = proplists:get_value(http, Config),
  438:     Method = get,
  439:     %% using HTTPS scheme with HTTP port to trigger connection error
  440:     URL = "https://" ++ HttpServer ++ ":" ++
  441:         integer_to_list(HttpPort) ++ "/index.html",
  442:     Opts = [],
  443:     HttpOpts = [],
  444:     Request = {URL,[]},
  445:     {error,{failed_connect,[_,{tls,_,_}]}} =
  446: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts).
  447: 
  448: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  449: http_timeout(doc) ->
  450:     ["Test http/https connect and upgrade timeouts."];
  451: http_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  452:     Method = get,
  453:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  454:     Request = {URL,[]},
  455:     Timeout = timer:seconds(1),
  456:     HttpOpts1 = [{timeout, Timeout}, {connect_timeout, 0}],
  457:     {error,
  458:      {failed_connect,
  459:       [{to_address,{"localhost",8000}},
  460:        {inet,[inet],timeout}]}}
  461: 	= httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts1, []),
  462:     ok.
  463: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  464: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
  465: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  466: 
  467: init_apps([], Config) ->
  468:     Config;
  469: init_apps([App|Apps], Config) ->
  470:     case app_start(App, Config) of
  471: 	ok ->
  472: 	    init_apps(Apps, Config);
  473: 	Error ->
  474: 	    Msg =
  475: 		lists:flatten(
  476: 		  io_lib:format(
  477: 		    "Could not start ~p due to ~p.~n",
  478: 		    [App, Error])),
  479: 	    {skip,Msg}
  480:     end.
  481: 
  482: app_start(App, Config) ->
  483:     try
  484: 	case App of
  485: 	    crypto ->
  486: 		crypto:stop(),
  487: 		ok = crypto:start();
  488: 	    inets ->
  489: 		application:stop(App),
  490: 		ok = application:start(App),
  491: 		case proplists:get_value(proxy, Config) of
  492: 		    undefined -> ok;
  493: 		    {_,ProxySpec} ->
  494: 			ok = httpc:set_options([{proxy,ProxySpec}])
  495: 		end;
  496: 	    _ ->
  497: 		application:stop(App),
  498: 		ok = application:start(App)
  499: 	end
  500:     catch
  501: 	Class:Reason ->
  502: 	    {exception,Class,Reason}
  503:     end.
  504: 
  505: app_stop(App) ->
  506:     application:stop(App).
  507: 
  508: make_cert_files(Config) ->
  509:     ClientFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "client"]),
  510:     ServerFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "server"]),
  511:     GenCertData =
  512:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  513:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  514:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  515:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  516:                                                   ]},
  517:                                     client_chain =>
  518:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  519:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  520:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  521:     inets_test_lib:gen_pem_config_files(GenCertData, ClientFileBase, ServerFileBase),
  522:     ok.
  523: 
  524: der_to_pem(File, Entries) ->
  525:     PemBin = public_key:pem_encode(Entries),
  526:     file:write_file(File, PemBin).
  527: 
  528: 
  529: 
  530: url(AbsPath, Config) ->
  531:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config),
  532:     {ServerName,ServerPort} = proplists:get_value(Protocol, Config),
  533:     atom_to_list(Protocol) ++ "://" ++
  534: 	ServerName ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(ServerPort) ++
  535: 	AbsPath.
  536: 
  537: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  538: 
  539: init_local_proxy(Config) ->
  540:     case os:type() of
  541: 	{unix,_} ->
  542: 	    case rcmd_local_proxy(["start"], Config) of
  543: 		{0,[":STARTED:"++String]} ->
  544: 		    init_local_proxy_string(String, Config);
  545: 		{_,[":SKIP:"++_|_]}=Reason ->
  546: 		    {skip,Reason};
  547: 		Error ->
  548: 		    rcmd_local_proxy(["stop"], Config),
  549: 		    ct:fail({local_proxy_start_failed,Error})
  550: 	    end;
  551: 	_ ->
  552: 	    {skip,"Platform cannot run local proxy start script"}
  553:     end.
  554: 
  555: init_local_proxy_string(String, Config) ->
  556:     {Proxy,Server} = split($|, String),
  557:     {ProxyName,ProxyPort} = split($:, Proxy),
  558:     {ServerName,ServerPorts} = split($:, Server),
  559:     {ServerHttpPort,ServerHttpsPort} = split($:, ServerPorts),
  560:     [{proxy,{local,{{ProxyName,list_to_integer(ProxyPort)},[]}}},
  561:      {http,{ServerName,list_to_integer(ServerHttpPort)}},
  562:      {https,{ServerName,list_to_integer(ServerHttpsPort)}}
  563:      |Config].
  564: 
  565: rcmd_local_proxy(Args, Config) ->
  566:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  567:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  568:     Script = filename:join(DataDir, ?LOCAL_PROXY_SCRIPT),
  569:     rcmd(Script, Args, [{cd,PrivDir}]).
  570: 
  571: rcmd(Cmd, Args, Opts) ->
  572:     Port =
  573: 	erlang:open_port(
  574: 	  {spawn_executable,Cmd},
  575: 	  [{args,Args},{line,80},exit_status,eof,hide|Opts]),
  576:     rcmd_loop(Port, [], [], undefined, false).
  577: 
  578: rcmd_loop(Port, Lines, Buf, Exit, EOF) ->
  579:     receive
  580: 	{Port,{data,{Flag,Line}}} ->
  581: 	    case Flag of
  582: 		noeol ->
  583: 		    rcmd_loop(Port, Lines, r(Line, Buf), Exit, EOF);
  584: 		eol ->
  585: 		    rcmd_loop(Port, [r(Buf, Line)|Lines], [], Exit, EOF)
  586: 	    end;
  587: 	{Port,{exit_status,Status}} when Exit =:= undefined ->
  588: 	    case EOF of
  589: 		true ->
  590: 		    rcmd_close(Port, Lines, Buf, Status);
  591: 		false ->
  592: 		    rcmd_loop(Port, Lines, Buf, Status, EOF)
  593: 	    end;
  594: 	{Port,eof} when EOF =:= false ->
  595: 	    case Exit of
  596: 		undefined ->
  597: 		    rcmd_loop(Port, Lines, Buf, Exit, true);
  598: 		Status ->
  599: 		    rcmd_close(Port, Lines, Buf, Status)
  600: 	    end;
  601: 	{Port,_}=Unexpected ->
  602: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_from_port,Unexpected})
  603:     end.
  604: 
  605: rcmd_close(Port, Lines, Buf, Status) ->
  606:     catch port_close(Port),
  607:     case Buf of
  608: 	[] ->
  609: 	    {Status,Lines};
  610: 	_ ->
  611: 	    {Status,[r(Buf)|Lines]}
  612:     end.
  613: 
  614: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  615: 
  616: %% Split on first match of X in Ys, do not include X in neither part
  617: split(X, Ys) ->
  618:     split(X, Ys, []).
  619: %%
  620: split(X, [X|Ys], Rs) ->
  621:     {r(Rs),Ys};
  622: split(X, [Y|Ys], Rs) ->
  623:     split(X, Ys, [Y|Rs]).
  624: 
  625: r(L) -> lists:reverse(L).
  626: r(L, R) -> lists:reverse(L, R).
